title: Frontline. Series 1. Desert angel. The Siege. We ain't got dames.
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television comedies
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television broadcasting of news
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television comedies - Australia
description: Episode of Series "Frontline". Three episodes from the highly acclaimed Australian comedy show which exposes life behind the cameras of a popular current affairs program. A beautiful aid worker believed missing in the desert is found and the Frontline staff attempt to get an exclusive in "Desert angel." Meanwhile, another network tries to poach legendary anchorman Mike Moore. A gunman takes several hostages in a remote farmhouse, and Frontline's questionable methods to gain a scoop boosts their ratings in "The Siege." Frontline tries to woo back female viewers by ditching their Friday night funnyman in "We ain't got dames."
